an9.40:2.3: khādanti → khāditaṃ (sya-all, mr) | ogāhā ca → ogāhaṃ (bj); ogāhāpi ca (sya-all, mr); ogāhañca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
an9.40:2.5: obhaggobhaggañcassa sākhābhaṅgaṃ na khādanti → na obhaggobhaggañca sākhābhaṅgaṃ khādati (sya-all, mr)
an9.40:3.2: ogāhā → ettha pisaddo sabbatthapi, parimajjitvā → parimadditvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | soṇḍaṃ saṃharati → kaṇḍuṃ saṃhanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); kaṇḍuṃ saṃhanati (sya-all)
an9.40:5.8: soṇḍaṃ saṃharati → kaṇḍuṃ saṃhanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); kaṇḍuṃ saṃhanati (sya-all)
